ORDER - This matter is before the court on defendants WP Company, LLC, d/b/a The Washington Post and NBCUniversal Media, LLC's unopposed motion for an extension time (Docket no. 6 ), and defendant Dow Jones & Company, Inc.'s consent motion for extension of time to respond to the complaint (Docket no. 8 ). Both motions request that the court extend the time for the moving defendants to file their answers or responsive pleadings from July 18, 2019 to August 20, 2019. Upon consideration of the motions, it is hereby ORDERED that defendants' motions are granted in part. Defendants WP Company, LLC, NBCUniversal Media, LLC, and Dow Jones & Company, Inc. shall have an additional three weeks, until August 8, 2019, to file their answers to the complaint or other responsive pleadings. Signed by Magistrate Judge John F. Anderson on 07/17/19. (cmar, ) (Entered: 07/17/2019)

ORDER Granting 50 Motion for Extension of Time to File; ORDERED that the deadline for Plaintiff's to respond to Defendants' Motions to Dismiss and Defendant Stefan A. Halper's Motion for Sanctions is hereby extended to and including August 30, 2019; that the deadline for Defendants to reply in support of their Motions to Dismiss and for Defendant Halper to reply in support of his Motion for Sanctions is hereby extended to and including September 13, 2019; that the hearing on the Motions to Dismiss and Motion for Sanctions is set for 10:00 a.m. on October 11, 2019. Signed by District Judge T. S. Ellis, III on 08/19/2019. (choy, ) (Entered: 08/19/2019)
